content.raw:
Thank you for looking at this so quickly.  The issue is not present using today's nightly build (the version you described above).

I was using Saturday's nightly build and hadn't noticed a merge that I would have expected to impact this.  I was hesitant to change builds after having problems with 2.8.2 and the 7:30AM version of Saturday's nightly.  For reference the version that has the problem is:
1.8.1~hg20130525r6e114947419d-1~precise
2.6.2~hg20130525r46a64cb6de0e-1~precise
content.html:
Thank you for looking at this so quickly. The issue is not present using today's nightly build (the version you described above).

I was using Saturday's nightly build and hadn't noticed a merge that I would have expected to impact this. I was hesitant to change builds after having problems with 2.8.2 and the 7:30AM version of Saturday's nightly. For reference the version that has the problem is: 1.8.1~hg20130525r6e114947419d-1~precise 2.6.2~hg20130525r46a64cb6de0e-1~precise
